Second, last episode of A2A has direct reference to Sam Tyler and hence...
Third - one single episode of BluRay is 3.03 GB (same as this one is 720p) and by that fact alone pretty much over the heads of many people who wants to know who was Sam and how good LoM was.
So, watching LoM after 3 seasons of A2A may be considered as needed information or memorabilia. Hence.
